headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Business Center user that you want to assign the asset to. You can obtain the Business Center user ID via user_id returned by /bc/member/get/ .

parameters.name: asset_type
parameters.description: Asset type. Enum values: ADVERTISER : ad account (advertiser account). CATALOG : catalog. TIKTOK_SHOP : TikTok Shop. LEAD : Leads. TT_ACCOUNT : TikTok account. This asset type corresponds to the identity type BC_AUTH_TT . Learn more from Identities .

parameters.name: asset_id
parameters.description: Asset ID. If asset_type is ADVERTISER , this field is the advertiser ID. If asset_type is CATALOG , this field is the catalog ID. If asset_type is TIKTOK_SHOP , this field is the TikTok Shop ID. If asset_type is LEAD , this field is the form library ID. To obtain more details about form libraries that you have access to, use /page/library/get/ . If asset_type is TT_ACCOUNT , this field is the ID of a TikTok account in a Business Center.

parameters.name: advertiser_role Conditional
parameters.description: Required when asset_type is ADVERTISER . Advertiser role. This is equivalent to Layer 2 of Ad Account Permissions. Enum values: ADMIN , OPERATOR , ANALYST . For details about these permissions, see Manage Permissions on TikTok Business Center .

parameters.name: catalog_role Conditional
parameters.description: Required when asset_type is CATALOG . Business Center user's permissions to the catalog. Enum values: ADMIN : The Business Center user has Admin permissions to the catalog. AD_PROMOTE : The Business Center user can only use the catalog for promotions.

parameters.name: form_library_role Conditional
parameters.description: Required when asset_type is LEAD . Form library role assigned to the user. Currently, only ADMIN is supported.

parameters.name: tt_account_roles Conditional
parameters.description: Required when asset_type is TT_ACCOUNT . Business Center user's permission to a TikTok account. Enum values: POST : Existing posts permissions, including accessing your own profile info, accessing your own public videos, and accessing your own ad-authorized videos. LIVE : LIVE video permissions (Only available in some regions), including accessing your own profile info and accessing LIVE videos. DIRECT_MESSAGE : Direct message permissions, including allowing everyone to send you a direct message and reading and managing direct messages in your inbox, in addition to messaging or interacting with other accounts on your behalf.

parameters.name: store_role Conditional
parameters.description: Required when asset_type is TIKTOK_SHOP . Business Center user's permission to a TikTok Shop. Enum values: AD_PROMOTION : The Business Center user can only use the TikTok Shop for promotions.
